San Mateo Drive', 'San Mateo, CA 94401', 'Spacious, light-filled floorplans, including:', "• Grand 9' ceilings", '• Full-size washer and dryer in each apartment', '• Central air conditioning and heat', '• Private patio or balcony in most apartments', '• Stainless steel Energy Star Frigidaire appliances include: refrigerator, dishwasher, electric range, microwave', '• EcoQuartz stone countertops', '• Espresso flat-panel cabinetry with European hardware', '• Recessed lighting throughout', '•', 'Deep soaking tubs and glass shower doors', '• Walk-in closet (per plan)', '• Disability access to unit, garage and pool', '• High-speed internet pre-installed', '• Oversized, double-paned windows', 'Community Features:', '• Heated swimming pool and whirlpool spa', '• Outstanding community room with entertainment media, catering kitchen, and billiards', '• Massive, state-of-the-art fitness center', '• Outdoor kitchen BBQ and dining area', '• Outdoor courtyard lounge area', '• High speed internet throughout common areas', '• Conference room / business center', "• Children's play area", '• Bike storage', '• Pet friendly community', '• Dog wash station and bark park', '• Assigned, covered parking with resident only access', 'Thank you for looking!']
